data.title: Word permutations
data.statement:
A word permutation of a word [[word]] with length [[N]] is a string, which uses the same characters as [[word]], has the same length [[N]] as [[word]], but might or might not have a different ordering of the characters.

For example, the word <<ham>> has 6 permutations: <<ham>>, <<hma>>, <<mah>>, <<mha>>, <<ahm>> and <<amh>>.

Given a word [[word]], you must find all unique permutations of [[word]] and print it separated by spaces in alphabetic order.

testCases.title: Base case
testCases.testOut: dorw dowr drow drwo dwor dwro odrw odwr ordw orwd owdr owrd rdow rdwo rodw rowd rwdo rwod wdor wdro wodr word wrdo wrod

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testOut: hnor hnro honr horn hrno hron nhor nhro nohr norh nrho nroh ohnr ohrn onhr onrh orhn ornh rhno rhon rnho rnoh rohn ronh

testCases.title: Repeating letters
testCases.testOut: abll albl allb ball blal blla labl lalb lbal lbla llab llba

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testOut: allt altl atll lalt latl llat llta ltal ltla tall tlal tlla

testCases.title: Monkeys like it
testCases.testOut: aaabnn aaanbn aaannb aabann aabnan aabnna aanabn aananb aanban aanbna aannab aannba abaann abanan abanna abnaan abnana abnnaa anaabn anaanb anaban anabna ananab ananba anbaan anbana anbnaa annaab annaba annbaa baaann baanan baanna banaan banana bannaa bnaaan bnaana bnanaa bnnaaa naaabn naaanb naaban naabna naanab naanba nabaan nabana nabnaa nanaab nanaba nanbaa nbaaan nbaana nbanaa nbnaaa nnaaab nnaaba nnabaa nnbaaa

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testOut: eeeefrr eeeerfr eeeerrf eeeferr eeefrer eeefrre eeerefr eeererf eeerfer eeerfre eeerref eeerrfe eefeerr eeferer eeferre eefreer eefrere eefrree eereefr eereerf eerefer eerefre eereref eererfe eerfeer eerfere eerfree eerreef eerrefe eerrfee efeeerr efeerer efeerre efereer eferere eferree efreeer efreere efreree efrreee ereeefr ereeerf ereefer ereefre ereeref ereerfe erefeer erefere erefree erereef ererefe ererfee erfeeer erfeere erferee erfreee erreeef erreefe errefee errfeee feeeerr feeerer feeerre feereer feerere feerree fereeer fereere fereree ferreee freeeer freeere freeree frereee frreeee reeeefr reeeerf reeefer reeefre reeeref reeerfe reefeer reefere reefree reereef reerefe reerfee refeeer refeere referee refreee rereeef rereefe rerefee rerfeee rfeeeer rfeeere rfeeree rfereee rfreeee rreeeef rreeefe rreefee rrefeee rrfeeee

data.constraints:
1<=N<=8

All words only use lower case letters

write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> Integer [[N]], representing the length of the string
<<Line 1:>> A string [[word]] with length [[N]]
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> All unique permutations of [[word]], separated by spaces, in alphabetic order.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

A word permutation of a word word with length N is a string, which uses the same characters as word, has the same length N as word, but might or might not have a different ordering of the characters.

For example, the word ham has 6 permutations: ham, hma, mah, mha, ahm and amh.

Given a word word, you must find all unique permutations of word and print it separated by spaces in alphabetic order.
Input
Line 1: Integer N, representing the length of the string
Line 1: A string word with length N
Output
Line 1: All unique permutations of word, separated by spaces, in alphabetic order.
Constraints
1<=N<=8

All words only use lower case letters
Example
Input
4
word
Output
dorw dowr drow drwo dwor dwro odrw odwr ordw orwd owdr owrd rdow rdwo rodw rowd rwdo rwod wdor wdro wodr word wrdo wrod
